data.name: Ending Way
data.detailed_description:
You wake up looking for mom and dad. You walk around the house and notice that they are not there. You start to see a lot of abnormal things. You go down to the basement and find a room with dead bodies. Demons are trying to attack you.

1. Ending way is a horror game and can be scary for some. If you have difficulty with it, you can take them carefully and always be prepared. The game is a horror action game. You need to find the way out and escape. Find items to use and dont die.

2. Find things that can make it easier for you

3. realistic environment and realistic creatures
data.about_the_game:
You wake up looking for mom and dad. You walk around the house and notice that they are not there. You start to see a lot of abnormal things. You go down to the basement and find a room with dead bodies. Demons are trying to attack you.

data.short_description: [Chapter 3] chapter 3 is now here waiting for you. With horrible creatures and things you can do to get out. But ...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2GB GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: indows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2GB GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: is recommended that the game is played on medium quality settings.
